Title: Dream
Description: ['The short follows the dream of a young boy in which strange whale teleports him to a fantasy land where a happy cat named Pero (modeled after the character in the ', Nagagutsu wo Haita Neko, " anime that serves as Toei Animation's mascot) appears.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The piece is entirely dialogueless.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN edited)']
